snippet: FIRST--Mervin H.,of Amityville, NY and New York City passed away on March 28, 2016 at the age of 87. He leaves his loving wife of 65 years, Sharon, son Dennis (Pam), daughter Ellen Gordon (Stuart), and six grandchildren; Joshua and Lauren Gordon, and Elissa, Lucas, Allison and Samantha First. 1/3
